text: Christa Linder is a German film actress.Weisser p.307 ==Selected filmography== * Kiss Kiss, Kill Kill (1966) * Seven Vengeful Women (1966) * The Strangler of the Tower (1966) * Countdown to Doomsday (1966) * The Rat Patrol Series TV S01E02 (1966) * Day of Anger (1967) * Lotus Flowers for Miss Quon (1967) *Kommissar X – Drei grüne Hunde (1967) * The Incredible Invasion (1971) *Italian Graffiti (1973) * Dracula in the Provinces (1975) * Bel ami : l'emprise des caresses (1976) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Thomas Weisser.
